fr:title.text: {C} is an {H}_n approximation of an optimal set cover

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: \mathcal {C} is an \mathcal {H}_n approximation of an optimal set cover

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: Let \mathcal {C}^* be an optimal set cover. Then, we have: \begin {align*} c(\mathcal {C}) &= \sum _{ e \in U } p(e) \\ &= \mathcal {H}_{ n } \sum _{ e \in U } \frac {p(e)}{\mathcal {H}_{ n }} \\ &\leq \mathcal {H}_{ n } \cdot c(\mathcal {C}^*) \end {align*}
